jobDescription: Senior Graphic Designer | San Jose, CA  We are a quickly expanding aesthetic skin care company based in California that offers its employees a truly entrepreneurial experience with great value on individual input and creative thinking. The company offers amazing marketing and support tools ranging from B2B sales collateral to in-office merchandising for physician offices to DTC marketing through print, web, email video and social media. The ideal candidate is highly motivated, is experienced in a range of graphic design areas and revels in a fast paced environment where everyone is expected to have fun, contribute and take part in the creative direction of the company. Join our team of highly motivated professional and experience the thrill of being a part of a leader in the medical skincare industry.  Jan Marini Skin Research, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is a recognized leader and innovator in skincare that is committed to continually expanding and improving the professional skincare market. JMSR's two primary focuses are to provide innovative technologies that deliver proven measurable results and an unwavering commitment to the ongoing success of our customers.  We are looking for candidates who want to make a career in the medical skincare industry and have the desire to be a part of a dynamic atmosphere. This candidate is responsible for the art direction, creative design and production of digital and print marketing materials to be used through social media, direct mail campaigns, print ad collateral, B2B sales collateral and more!
